>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<


Prior to the 1.0.97 release of citeproc-js, this produced the result
"Beato T., T. Kitano, R. Atkinson". New API provides
more intuitive control over formatting of transliterated
names, but cannot be tested through the standard test suit
machinery.

>>===== RESULT =====>>
葉俊榮, 台大法律系與林子儀 &#38; 簡資修, 中研院法律所
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0"
      default-locale="en-US-x-translit-ja-alalc97-x-translit-en">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <locale>
    <terms>
      <term name="and" form="long">與</term>
      <term name="and" form="symbol">、</term>
    </terms>
  </locale>
  <citation>
    <layout delimiter="; ">
      <names variable="author">
        <name and="symbol"/>
        <institution and="text"/>
      </names>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "author": [
            {
                "family": "葉俊", 
                "given": "榮"
            }, 
            {
                "family": "台大法律系", 
                "given": "",
                "isInstitution": "true"
            }, 
            { 
                "family":"林",
                "given":"子儀"
            },
            {
                "family":"簡",
                "given":"資修"
            },
            {
                "family":"中研院法律所",
                "given":"",
                "isInstitution": "true"
            }
        ], 
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "type": "book"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
